Name: sarcoid meningitis
Definition: A trypanosomiasis that involves inflammation of the meninges caused due to Trypanosoma species.

Name: obsolete meningitis with clear cerebrospinal fluid
Definition: A trypanosomiasis that involves inflammation of the meninges caused due to Trypanosoma species.

Name: obsolete Fetal-maternal hemorrhage affecting management of mother
Definition: A trypanosomiasis that involves inflammation of the meninges caused due to Trypanosoma species.
